Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near State/Lake
ShortDescription: NB 146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Wacker Place, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Wacker Place, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/Lake.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 35th-Bronzeville-IIT. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 35th-Bronzeville-IIT.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
